rBody.wit: CAO-C CAO-B CAO-E CAO-M CAO-V CAO-H CAO-R CAO-D CAO-F CAO-S CAO-L

res.rBody: Cantantibus organis Caecilia virgo in corde suo soli domino decantabat dicens fiat domine cor meum et corpus meum immaculatum ut non confundar

vBody.wit: CAO-B CAO-M CAO-V CAO-H CAO-R CAO-D

verses.vBody:
Biduanis ac triduanis ieiuniis orans
commendabat se commendabat domino
quod timebat quem timebat

Biduanis ac triduanis ieiuniis orans suam Domino pudicitiam
commendabat dicens commendabat

rep.wit: CAO-C CAO-B CAO-E CAO-M CAO-V CAO-H CAO-R CAO-D CAO-F CAO-S CAO-L
